subject: CLS
name: Spec Lab Methods
info: Assignment on an individual basis to one of a variety of special areas of experience in the clinical lab.prereq: instr consent

name: Virol/Mycol/Parasit
fullname: Virology, Mycology, and Parasitology for Medical Technologists
info: Lab diagnosis of viral, fungal, and parasitic infections.  Lecture.prereq: microbiology course with lab, biochem course

subject: CLS
name: Diagnostic Microbiology Lectur
info: Techniques used in lab diagnosis of infectious disease. Isolating/identifying bacteria/yeast. Antibacterial susceptibility testing. Lecture.

subject: CLS
name: Diagnostic Microbiology Lab
info: Techniques used in lab diagnosis of infectious disease. Isolating/identifying bacteria/yeasts. Antimicrobial susceptibility testing. Lab.

subject: CLS
name: Prin Diag Microbiol Lec
info: Current techniques used in lab diagnosis of infectious disease. Isolating/identifying bacteria/yeasts. Antimicrobial susceptibility testing. Lecture.

name: Seminar:  CLS
info: Current literature. Presentation/discussion of research.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS
name: Journal Presentations
info: Critical analysis, evaluation, discussion of current journal articles in student's specialty area.prereq: 1st yr CLS grad student

subject: CLS
name: Practicum Teaching
info: Supervised teaching experience, develop skills using instructional materials, tests, and measurements.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS
name: Intro Mgmt Educ II
fullname: Introduction to Management and Education II
info: Basic concepts in management and education.

subject: CLS
name: Lab Admin
info: Leadership styles, employee selection and evaluation, communications, motivation, morale, discipline, job descriptions, record keeping, budgets, cost accounting, purchasing, product evaluation, lab safety, labor relations, government regulations.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS
name: Practicum Lab Admin
info: Supervised experience and assignment of specific problems related to lab service and management in health care institutions.prereq: instr consent

name: Adv Clin Microbiol

name: Adv Clin Chemistry
info: Observation, study, and practice in special problems, advanced techniques, and methodology.

subject: CLS
name: Hemat I: Basic Tech
info: Theory/application of basic principles in clinical Hematology. Lecture, lab.

subject: CLS
name: Hematology II
info: Fundamentals of examining blood and bone marrow. Identification of normal, immature, and abnormal cells.  Correlation of clinical and lab findings. Lecture, lab.

subject: CLS
name: Hemostasis
info: Theory/application of concepts/techniques in hemostasis/coagulation. Lecture online, lab.

subject: CLS
name: Urinalysis
info: Procedures for physical, chemical, and microscopic examination of urine. Lecture, lab.

subject: CLS
name: Clinical Chemistry I
fullname: Clinical Chemistry I: Lecture and Lab
info: Principles/theory of clinical chemistry. Assessing renal/metabolic disease/dysfunction, electrolyte/acid-base Quality management. Lecture online, lab.

subject: CLS
name: Clinical Chemistry II
info: Principles/application of clinical chemistry. Correlation of clinical/lab findings.

subject: CLS
name: Clinical Chemistry II: Lab
info: Principles/application of lab procedures in clinical chemistry.

subject: CLS
name: Clin Chem I: Lab
info: Application of clinical chemistry principles and laboratory techniques in the analysis of urine, plasma, and body fluids.  Emphasis on laboratory tests to evaluate renal function, electrolytes, and acid-base balance.  Introduction to principles and processes for managing test quality.  Laboratory.

subject: CLS
name: Molecular Diagnostics
info: Basic theory/application of molecular diagnostics in clinical lab. Lecture, lab.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS
name: Intro Transfusion Medicine
info: Principles of blood grouping, antibody identification, compatibility testing, and donor testing.

subject: CLS
name: Transfusion Med Laboratory
info: Exercises illustrating basic techniques in blood grouping, antibody identification, compatibility testing, and donor testing.

name: Mgm. & Prof. Issues
info: Basic concepts in professional issues/management as applied to clinical lab.

name: Education and Research

info: Basic concepts in education and research as applied to the clinical laboratory.

subject: CLS
name: Adv Heme
info: Practical experience collecting bone marrow from patients. Diagnosing hematological diseases by evaluating and interpreting cells from clinical specimens of bone marrow, peripheral blood, and, if applicable, lymph nodes.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS

info: Departmental clinical lab research seminar series.prereq: instr consent

subject: CLS

info: Individual research project in a selected area.prereq: instr consent

name: Ed Admin Med Tech
